title: Skill Factory
description: Allows the CEO to create new personal skills on demand — code tools, LLM prompts, or API integrations. Enable this to let your CEO build custom capabilities for the organization.
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: create_skill
commands.description: Create a new personal skill — code tool, LLM prompt, or API integration

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Skill category: creation, research, communication, or analysis

parameters.name: commands
parameters.description: Array of command objects with name, description, and parameters

parameters.name: connection_type
parameters.description: none (code skill), llm (prompt skill), or api_key (API skill)

parameters.name: system_prompt
parameters.description: LLM system prompt for llm-type skills

parameters.name: handler_code
parameters.description: TypeScript handler code for code-type skills

returns.description: Confirmation message with skill ID and status
